content: White strongly condemns Orange's unprovoked invasion of Purple. This act of aggression threatens regional stability and undermines international law. We call on Orange to immediately cease hostilities and pursue diplomatic solutions.
White expresses solidarity with Purple and denounces Orange's unjustified attack. We are coordinating with allies to respond and are prepared to assist Purple.
White proposes coordinating condemnation and penalties on Orange for their invasion of Purple. This aggression cannot stand.
White remains committed to assisting Purple. We can provide cybersecurity support and condemn Orange's actions in international bodies.
White proposes coordinated economic sanctions and freezing assets of Orange leadership. This requires our unity.
Red, let us resolve this crisis through diplomacy. War will only lead to more suffering.
White remains committed to supporting Purple both economically and defensively against Orange's aggression. Let's continue coordination.
White proposes a coordinated regime of economic sanctions on Orange. This can impose costs without risking military escalation.
Red, let us work together to avoid uncontrolled escalation. Neither of us want open war. There are still openings for diplomacy.
White remains committed to supporting Purple diplomatically and economically against Orange's aggression. Let's continue coordination.
